text: The Beisfjord massacre () was a massacre on 18 July 1942 in Beisfjord, Norway of 288 political prisoners who were killed at the concentration camp in Beisfjord: ["Beisfjord camp number 1"] Lager I Beisfjord. The massacre was ordered a few days earlier by the Reichskommissar for Norway Josef Terboven. ==References== Category:Massacres in Norway Category:War crimes Category:1942 in Europe Category:1940s in Norway
title: Beisfjord massacre
